name: mathjax-full
description: Beautiful and accessible math in all browsers. MathJax is an open-source JavaScript display engine for LaTeX, MathML, and AsciiMath notation that works in all browsers and in server-side node applications. This package includes the source code as well as the packaged components.

scripts.clean:dir: clean() { pnpm -s log:single "Cleaning $1 directory"; pnpm rimraf $1; }; clean
scripts.clean:lib: clean() { pnpm -s log:single "Cleaning $1 components"; pnpm rimraf -g components/$1'/**/lib'; }; clean
scripts.clean:mod: clean() { pnpm -s log:comp "Cleaning $1 module"; pnpm -s clean:dir $1 && pnpm -s clean:lib $1; }; clean
scripts.copy:mj2: copy() { pnpm -s log:single 'Copying legacy code AsciiMath'; pnpm copyfiles -u 1 'ts/input/asciimath/legacy/**/*' $1; }; copy
scripts.copy:mml3: copy() { pnpm -s log:single 'Copying legacy code MathML3'; pnpm copyfiles -u 1 ts/input/mathml/mml3/mml3.sef.json $1; }; copy
scripts.copy:assets: pnpm -s log:comp 'Copying assets'; copy() { pnpm -s copy:mj2 $1 && pnpm -s copy:mml3 $1; }; copy
scripts.copy:pkg: copy() { pnpm -s log:single "Copying package.json to $1"; pnpm copyfiles -u 2 components/bin/package.json $1; }; copy
scripts.clean:cjs:components: pnpm -s log:single "Cleaning cjs components" pnpm rimraf components/cjs
scripts.compile:cjs:components: pnpm -s log:single 'Compiling component files'; pnpm tsc --project tsconfig/components.json
scripts.finalize:cjs:components: pnpm -s log:comp 'Finalize cjs components'; pnpm -s copy:cjs:components && pnpm -s copy:pkg components/cjs && pnpm -s clean:lib cjs
scripts.make:cjs:components: make() { pnpm -s log:single 'Making cjs components'; components/bin/makeAll --cjs --terse --bundle-cjs $1 components/cjs; }; make
scripts.compile:cjs: pnpm -s log:single 'Compiling cjs typescript files' && pnpm tsc --project tsconfig/cjs.json
scripts.build:cjs:components:src: pnpm -s log:comp 'Building cjs components sources'; pnpm clean:cjs:components && pnpm compile:cjs:components && pnpm finalize:cjs:components
scripts.build:cjs:components: pnpm -s log:comp 'Building cjs components'; pnpm -s build:cjs:components:src; pnpm clean:dir bundle-cjs; pnpm -s make:cjs:components --build
scripts.build:cjs:src: pnpm -s link:full && pnpm clean:dir cjs && pnpm -s compile:cjs && pnpm -s copy:assets cjs && pnpm -s copy:pkg cjs
scripts.build:cjs: pnpm -s log:header 'Building cjs'; pnpm -s build:cjs:src && pnpm -s build:cjs:components
scripts.make:mjs:components: pnpm -s log:single 'Making cjs components'; components/bin/makeAll --mjs --terse components/mjs
scripts.build:mjs:components: pnpm -s log:comp 'Compiling MJS component files'; pnpm clean:mjs:components; pnpm clean:mjs:bundle; pnpm make:mjs:components; pnpm finalize:mjs:bundle
scripts.compile:mjs: pnpm -s log:comp 'Compiling MJS typescript files' && pnpm tsc --project tsconfig/mjs.json
scripts.build:mjs:src: pnpm -s link:full && pnpm -s clean:mjs:dest && pnpm -s compile:mjs && pnpm -s copy:assets mjs
scripts.build:mjs: pnpm -s log:header 'Building mjs'; pnpm -s build:mjs:src && pnpm -s build:mjs:components
scripts.mml3-xslt: pnpm -s premake-mml3-xslt && pnpm -s make-mml3-xslt && pnpm -s postmake-mml3-xslt
scripts.clean: pnpm -s clean:mod cjs && pnpm -s clean:mod mjs && pnpm -s clean:dir bundle && pnpm -s clean:cjs:bundle
